name: Ends of Paul Litres
description:
An absurd top-down shooter. #AbsurdGamesJam

These are the ends of Paul Litres. All of them. Half infinity worth of endings but they're all the same. Half infinity of different Paul Litres with different guns but it won't make a difference.

Submission for Absurd Games Jam 

For more Paul Litre play Duck Date. She talks there but you don't get to be her.

For my other game visit the rest of my itch.io. And hey, all donations help. Can't make them games without coffee or food.
